SQL: SELECT * from REP_ALLOT_INFORM WHERE ISDELETED NOT IN(1) and ALLOT_STATUS = 3 and ALLOT_STATUS != 2 <#if input ?exists && input ?length gt 0> and CALLIN_DEPARTMENT like '%' || '${input}' || '%' </#if> <#if output ?exists && output ?length gt 0> and CALLOUT_DEPARTMENT like '%' || '${output}' || '%' </#if>
